name: Pummeling Charge

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Unarmed Strike, Pummeling Style; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th.

sections.text: When using Pummeling Style, you can charge and make a Pummeling Style attack at the end of your charge as part of the charge action.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: Making a Pummeling Style attack is a full-round action.
sections.name: Normal

prerequisites: base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th
description: Your charge ends with a mighty haymaker.
